title: BOC User can Edit the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user

test_boc_approver@mlb.com	pass@HEARD

AND there is at least one transaction on the Pending daily TX bulletin
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing the Transactions menu and clicking the edit pencil icon to the left of a player on a Daily Transaction Bulletin tab
AND entering "Test" for the player name
AND changing the Position dropdown to LHS
AND entering 1.103 for Current MLS
AND changing the Transaction date to yesterday's date
AND changing the Approval date to today's date
AND clicking Save
custom_expected:
THEN the row will open in edit mode when clicking Edit
AND a blue notification will appear on Save
AND the row will return to view mode after clicking save
AND the entered changes will be reflected in the row

title: User can add a row in the Taxi Squad widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in a test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers over the Transactions tab on the left nav bar
AND clicks Taxi Squad
AND clicks the Add Row button
AND selects a "SD" from the Org dropdown
AND selects the first value in the player dropdown
ANd clicks "Save"
custom_expected: THEN a blue success notification will appear that reads: "1 Taxi Squad entry was saved."

title: User can edit a row in the Taxi Squad widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in a test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND user has completed C1213697
AND is viewing the Taxi Squad widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the Pencil icon on the left of the newly added row from C1213697
AND changes the value in the Player dropdown to the second player
AND changes the date to today's date
AND changes to the time to 9:30 AM
AND changes the Result to Recalled
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN a blue success notification appears that reads "1 Taxi Squad entry was saved"
AND the row is in view mode
AND the changes are reflected in the row

title: BOC Approver can approve transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD

AND there exists at least one transaction that is Submitted to BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigtes to the Clipboard through the nav buttons at the top of the page

AND views the Pending Approvals Widget

AND finds a transaction ready for approval

AND clicks the checkbox

AND clicks the Approve button that becomes available at the bottom of the widget
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update all of the selected tx to have a status of "Approved"

AND make all "On Approved" updates for all of the selected tx's

AND a blue success notification appears

title: BOC Approver can reject transactions from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD

AND there exists at least one transaction that is Submitted to BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Clipboard through the nav buttons at the top of the page

AND views the Pending Approvals Widget

AND finds a transaction ready for approval

AND clicks the checkbox

AND clicks the Reject button that becomes available at the bottom of the widget
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update all of the selected tx to have a status of "Rejected"

AND make all "On Approved" updates for all of the selected tx's

AND a notification is generated for the affected Club's notification widget

AND a blue success notification appears

title: User can create a new Passed Over Player Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in a test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers over Domestic Amateur on the left nav bar
AND clicks on New Player
AND fills in "Test" for First Name
AND Last "zzAuto" for the Last Name
AND selects today's date 20 years in the past for Birth Date
AND types "Uni" in the school box
AND waits for matches to appear in the drop-down below School
AND selects the first entry in the list
AND clicks Next
custom_expected: THEN it will take the user to a new, blank domestic amateur player profile in edit mode with the selected items populated on the form

title: User can save a new passed over player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in a test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
GIVEN that user has completed C1213709
AND the user is in edit mode on a domestic amateur player profile
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills in the Roster First Name
AND fills in Height as 6 feet 2 inches
AND 215 lbs for Weight
AND selects "Switch" Bats
AND selects "Switch" for Throws
AND enters in "2222222222" for Phone Number
AND enters "111111111" for Number in the National ID(s) section
AND clicks "Save"
AND navigates to the players Draft History profile tab
custom_expected:
THEN the system will save the new player
AND a blue successful save notification will display. 
AND the "Draft Year" field will be populated with the previous year's draft year. 
AND the "Origin" field will not be populated. 
AND the player's Draft History will remain blank. 
AND the player's Rule 4 Status is set to Passed Over

title: A Club user can edit an existing Passed Over player profile so club can sign him
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
AND the user has read and stored the Rule 4 Draft Date system date (will be used later to determine draft year based on today's date)
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Advanced Search via the magnifying glass link at the top
AND selects Search For > Domestic Amateur Player
AND selects Rule 4 Draft Status -> Is -> Passed Over for the first filter
AND selects Draft Year -> Equals -> If [today's date] is after the [Rule 4 Draft system date] and before Dec. 31st, Use: [Current year]; Else, Use: [Current year - 1]
AND selects Origin Is Major League Scouting Bureau for the third filter
AND clicks on the player's name
AND clicks Edit Signing Info at the bottom
AND clicks Add Number in the Phone Number(s) section
AND selects "Cell" from the type dropdown
AND enters "2222222222" into the blank, right-most Phone Number field
AND clicks the "Primary" radio button beneath that field
AND clicks Save

(sample player: https://ebisqa.mlb.com/ebisui/#/domestic-amateur/domestic-amateur-info?domAmaEntryId=1035110&playerId=750647)
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blue success notification that reads "The player has been saved successfully"

title: A BOC user can edit an existing Passed Over player profile so club can sign him (including name and DOB change)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND the user has read and stored the Rule 4 Draft Date system date (will be used later to determine draft year based on today's date)
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Advanced Search via the magnifying glass link at the top
AND selects Search For > Domestic Amateur Player
AND selects Rule 4 Draft Status -> Is -> Passed Over for the first filter
AND selects Draft Year -> Equals -> If [today's date] is after the [Rule 4 Draft system date] and before Dec. 31st, Use: [Current year]; Else, Use: [Current year - 1]
AND selects Origin Is Major League Scouting Bureau for the third filter
AND clicks on a player's name
AND clicks Edit Signing Info at the bottom
AND selects SD from the drop-down in the resulting modal
AND clicks OK
AND adds a "zz" in front of the players Last Name
AND adds a "zz" in front of the players First Name
AND moves the player's birth date forward one day
AND clicks Add Number in the Phone Number(s) section
AND selects "Cell" from the type dropdown
AND enters "2222222222" into the blank, right-most Phone Number field
AND clicks the "Primary" radio button beneath that field
AND clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blue success notification that reads "The player has been saved successfully"

title: BOC user can edit Int'l Amateur player profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in



BOC user: test_boc_approver@mlb.com pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user clicks the red arrow in the Quick Search box in the upper-right
AND selects International Amateur players
AND enters in "Abr" in the search box
AND selects the first name in the list

AND clicks Edit
AND fills in 6 ft 2 in for Height
AND fills in 215 for Weight
AND fills in Switch for Bats
AND fills in Switch for Throws
AND fills in LHS for Position
AND fills in "2222222222" in the Phone Number field
AND clicks Add Number under the phones numbers section
AND selects "Home" for the type drop-down
AND enters in "3333333333" for the number
AND selects the "Primary" radio button
AND enters in "Test" in the first line of Street Address
AND enters in "Test" in City
AND selects "Texas" from the Stat dropdown
AND enters in "11111" for the Zip Code
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN the profile reloads in view mode
AND the entered values  are reflected on the profile

title: View an Int'l Grandfathered profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in 



BOC user: test_boc_approver@mlb.com pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to an International Grandfathered Profile 



ex:  https://ebistrn.mlb.com/ebisui/#/intl-amateur/info?playerId=768798



ex: https://ebistrn.mlb.com/ebisui/#/intl-amateur/info?playerId=399988 -- USE THIS ONE
custom_expected:
THEN profile header should show "L1 Registered: Grandfathered"
AND the L2 Registered field should be blank
AND the following fields are not present in the header:

Registration Status
Verified By
Verified On
L2 Possiblity

title: Save an Int'l Grandfathered profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to an International Grandfathered Profile



ex:  https://ebistrn.mlb.com/ebisui/#/intl-amateur/info?playerId=768798



ex:  https://ebistrn.mlb.com/ebisui/#/intl-amateur/info?playerId=399988 -- USE THIS ONE

AND clicks Edit
AND enters a "zz" in front of the player's Roster First Name
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN the profile will reload in view mode
AND the entered change will be reflected

title: Grandfathered profile is not available in quick search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND is viewing an int'l amateur profile (ex: https://ebisqa.mlb.com/ebisui/#/intl-amateur/info?playerId=399988
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the red arrow in the Quick Search box in the upper-right
AND selects "International Amateur"
AND enters the player's name into the search box as "Last, First"
custom_expected: THEN no search results will appear matching the selected player

title: A user can save an advanced search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an advanced search

AND "Save Search" appears and is enabled as soon as the first filter's criteria is added.

BUT "Save Search" is disabled if no criteria is entered.
custom_steps:
WHEN entering Search for > Professional Player
AND entering Last Name > Contains > "Test" for the first filter
AND clicks Save Search
AND enters in "Automation" for the Search Label
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN it triggers a pop-up that allows the user to enter in the title of their search

AND a blue notification will appear to indicate that the search was saved. 

AND a new dropdown appears to the right of the "Search For" dropdown

AND the entered Search Label is available as an option from the new dropdown

title: A user can run a saved search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has completed C1213725
AND a dropdown with the placeholder text "Saved searches" appears to the right of the search for dropdown on the advanced search screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the saved search from the new dropdown
custom_expected: THEN it will automatically populate the search filters with the parameters entered when saving the search

title: A user can delete a saved search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as test_BOC_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND has completed the "User can run a saved search" test case
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the saved search from the dropdown next to "Search For"
AND clicks "delete search"
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown to the right of "Search For" no longer shows the label for the search that was deleted
AND if that was the only saved search then the dropdown disappears
